pages.title: Salt Reactor
pages.text: The <item>Salt Reactor/$ is a way of cooling, $(l:crossroads:heat/icebox)even below -20Â°C/$. It consumes <thing>$(l:crossroads:fluid/centrifuge)salt and distilled water/$ in a ratio of 200mB of distilled water per salt, while producing 200mB of normal water for every 200mB of distilled water. Every salt lasts for 20 ticks (10 redstone ticks, 1 second) as fuel.$(br2)

The <item>Salt Reactor/$ can cool all the way down to <thing>absolute zero/$. <item>$(l:crossroads:heat/cable)Heat cables/$ connect to the bottom, pipes can connect to any side both to input distilled water and output water.$(br2)
